title: Tic-Tac-Toe Game
description: Description: Developed a Tic-Tac-Toe game using C# and WPF, allows two players to take turns marking cells and determines the winner or a tie.

title: Heist Maze Game
description: Description: Developed a C++ Console-based game called Heist Maze project, that challenges the user to steal loot from a maze filled with enemies of different variants.

title: VEXU Robotics Documentation
description: This is out entire VEXU robotics Engineering Notebook, which includes the entire documentation throughout the 2021-2022 season.
